document.full_text: rory mcilroy of northern ireland grabbed the early lead in the first round of the masters with a seven-under 65, but alvaro quiros of spain caught him with a late surge.
document.title: co-leaders' short games go a long way
lines_and_colors: rory mcilroy of northern ireland grabbed the early lead in the first round of the masters with a seven-under 65, but alvaro quiros of spain caught him with a late surge.
